While Samuel was in the act of presenting a lamb as a burnt offering, the Philistines drew near for battle. Then the 
                                                                           591
Mighty One who had descended upon Sinai amid fire and smoke and thunder, who had parted the Red Sea and made a way through Jordan for the children of Israel, again manifested His power. A terrible storm burst upon the advancing host, and the earth was strewn with the dead bodies of mighty warriors.
